text: Common brands of #Tramadol #opiates include #Ultram ER and #ConZip. Although Tramadol is an #opioid analgesic, used to treat moderate to moderately severe #pain, the #DEA reports that 3.2 million people in the US had used Tramadol for non-medical purposes.
